content: finished baby ribbed hat measures 3-month old = 14 inch circumference by 6 inches long with ww yarn newborn = 13″ cir by 5-1/2″ long with ww yarn small newborn = 12″ cir by 4 75″ long with dk yarn if using dk yarn crochet one addl round before adding 3 row of ribbing to achieve 4 75 inch long hat hooks h 5 mm us sized crochet hook for 3-month baby g 4 mm or 4 25 us sized crochet hook for newborn materials 1 ounce worsted medium weight or aran yarn dk yarn or light gauge ww yarn 3 row =1 4 25 sts = 1 dk yarn 4 row = 1 4 sts = 1
